data.title: Mellaly: Online Marketing e-Learning Platform
data.teaser: In order to fully reap the benefits of online marketing, one must first understand it.
answers:
Do you know the feeling? Have you worked hard, through day and night to make a great product, but in the end nobody knows about your product except you and your friends?
My name is Mohamed EL-Kherba and I’m from Berlin and since 2004, I’ve been a website designer and online marketer. I market products for small and medium sized companies.
I can refer to the experience I have gained over the last eight years to create an e-learning platform for online marketing. I plan on this platform being ready in July.

Anyone who wants to succeed as an entrepreneur, but wishes to do so without the internet will not succeed. After many people make transactions online, they always return to shopping online. Whether self-employed, small or medium-sized entrepreneurs, website owners, project manager for performances on the Internet or marketing decision-makers, everyone benefits from an extensive knowledge about online marketing. In order to fully reap the benefits of online marketing, one must first understand it. For this purpose, i wand to start an online marketing course, in which, everyone learns online marketing strategies.

In the online marketing course from Mellaly you learn all the requirements for online marketing success. First of all, it is quite important for you to establish your website. This is how the best strategies begin. Furthermore, the participants learn from the online marketing course how to use advertising skillfully. Whoever really wants to be successful on the Internet, which will definitely need sound knowledge, can learn through the e-learning platform Mellaly.
But what good are these methods when you do not know if they deliver the desired results for the company? This problem is also discussed in my course and resolved. There participants learn techniques for targeted follow-up and improve their online marketing efforts. An entrepreneur must always be flexible to adjust to different situations. In addition, the course defines different legalities.

What is learned in Mellaly?

   - All topics having to do with online marketing.

   - Online Marketing Strategies

   - Web Project Management

   - Strategies & Planning

   - Multi-Channel Marketing

   - Web Analytics.

   - Conversion Rate Optimization & more ....

Any help counts.

With your support we can give you and others the right knowledge.

Our initial goal was to raise the funds to:

·      Pay for the time as well as Software & Hardware

·      Pay our amazing graphic artist

I can't wait to get this great project into your hands and hope for your support.  If you like this Project, please tell your friends about it and spread the word on Facebook and Twitter.  Your help getting the word out will make this Project a reality.  Thanks again for checking out Mellaly!

My name is Mohamed EL-Kherba and I’m from Berlin and since 2004, I’ve been a website designer and online marketer. I market products for small and medium sized companies.
However, my favorite part of working for myself as an internet marketer is the satisfaction I get from helping others build their own online businesses and enjoy lifestyles they had only dreamed of before. I’ve helped hundreds of people start and/or build online businesses. As your personal internet marketing consultant I can help you dramatically grow your business online.
